column4: i broke my install, and reinstalled in my / partition, now i cant access my home partition, and i have pretty much narrowed it down to the encryption. any ideas?
anyone have any ideas on my /home partition problem?
did you tell the installer to mount the /home partition at /home
Goto /home and type ls -al then pastebin the result
I asked you to do this like 30 minutes ago
are you saying to cd to home?
i dont know the pastebin, and its only three lines
it says r is an invalid option
R worked, but it still didnt resolve my problem
